effect: [Don!! x1] [During the opponent's turn] [Once per turn] If your character with power 5000 or higher is KOed, that character will receive -1000 power during this turn instead of being KOed.
[Activation Main] [Once per turn] You can discard 1 card from your hand: Draw 1 card. @[When attacking] Up to one of your opponent's characters gets -1 cost during this turn.
[During your opponent's turn] [Once per turn] When your Life becomes 0, add the top card of your deck to your Life. After that, discard 1 card from your hand.
